description: Fully functional 3-part intent-based trading system with smart contracts, backend API, and React frontend

api: POST /api/intent/parse - Natural language intent parsing with regex and optional OpenAI
frontend: Natural language intent parser (e.g., 'Swap 1 ETH to USDC')
Real-time intent parsing with AI-powered route optimization
Manual form fallback for advanced users
Dashboard with statistics and intent history

technology_stack.backend: Node.js, Express, ethers.js, Optional OpenAI integration
technology_stack.frontend: React, Vite, TailwindCSS, shadcn/ui, TanStack Query

demo_flow.step_1: User enters natural language intent: 'Swap 1 ETH to USDC'
demo_flow.step_2: System parses intent using NLP (regex or OpenAI)
demo_flow.step_3: Displays parsed intent with route optimization
demo_flow.step_5: Intent is registered and queued for execution
demo_flow.step_6: User clicks execute to simulate blockchain execution
demo_flow.step_7: Intent status updates to completed with transaction details

run_instructions.server_dev: cd server && npm run dev (runs on port 3001)
run_instructions.client_dev: npm run dev (integrated Vite + Express on port 5000)
run_instructions.full_stack: npm run dev (starts both frontend and backend)
